summary: DT:  THE CONTACT STATED ALL OF THE POWER WINDOWS EXCEPT THE FRONT DRIVER'S WINDOW FAILED TO OPERATE.  THE WINDOWS WERE NOT USED OFTEN.  THE POWER WINDOWS WERE STUCK IN THE UP POSITION AND WOULD NOT MOVE.  WHEN PRESSING THE  BUTTONS THERE WAS NO NOISE COMING FROM THE POWER WINDOW MOTORS.  THE INDEPENDENT REPAIR SHOP REPLACED THE THREE WINDOW MOTORS THAT FAILED ON JANUARY 6, 2006.  *AK
